name: test_e2e_with_logs[157_PATH_DBL_003]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `PATH_DBL_003` |
| **Name** | Double encoded dot |
| **Category** | PATH |
| **Subcategory** | double_encoding |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `%252e%252e/%252e%252e/%252e%252e/etc/passwd`
- **Encoded**: `%25252e%25252e%2F%25252e%25252e%2F%25252e%25252e%2Fetc%2Fpasswd`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~24000ms
- **Timestamp**: 09:37:23.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence
